website_summaries.verdict: Portable and sets the mood with an advanced ability to sync with music.
pros: Powerful sound and ability to create ambience as well
Customers appreciate this device's ability to serve up music just as well as a live DJ
High marks for overall quality of sound
cons: Some report the bass is a bit too strong

customer_reviews.title: Small,unbelievably powerful for its size, elegant.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not often that I’d take the time to write a review but the Auro Studio 2 is well deserving of one. Small, powerful, elegant and will attract plenty of attention. Everyone that has experienced the sound and has seen the unit in my apartment has inquired where they can get one. The bass is so unbelievably strong and the music so crisp, I almost regret ever purchasing other systems. I’ve previously owned a Denon 5.1 System and a Pioneer receiver. You will not be disappointed. I promise you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speakers hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Sony, Bose, and JBL... but none of them compare to the sound of this HK. I first purchased one unit, and when I read you could pair with an addition unit I was curious. After using the speaker alone for about a month a sprang for the second unit. Haven't regretted that decision for a minute. Pairing the two speakers was difficult as the instructions do not explain the process well. You must pair the speakers together before connecting to your bluetooth device (music source - Phone, Tablet, Computer, Etc) If one of the speakers pairs with your device before you attempt to pair the two speakers, they will not pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gib

customer_reviews.title: Style, sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more satisfied. I was shopping around for a Bluetooth speaker, and nearly bought a Bose speaker for $350. I was standing there at Target testing it out despite how obnoxious that is, and feeling disappointed with the quality. The style, the sound, all for that price. Then I remembered this brand, and for the price decided it was worth a try. Upon opening the box I was filled with excitement. It’s so elegantly designed. After testing out the sound, well... I may have danced around with joy. I can’t recommend this more.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Beautiful sound system
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing, the sound is rich, bass is deep yet manageable and can get extremely loud without sacrificing clarity. The design is absolutely beautiful and always a conversation piece. The LED lights are a very nice, tasteful touch. Also, this speaker works flawlessly with my Echo Dot, and makes for a very nice setup.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Why
customer_reviews.text: I bought one before. It's wonderful. So i decide to buy it again for pairing. It increased price after four days last time I bought it. I just don't know why I bought for new one but the merchandise they sent to me is the old /used/returned one.
customer_reviews.author: wuhan

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker but it’s not the best for the money
customer_reviews.text: I tried and returned this speaker. I have two tower speakers and a subwoofer and I wanted to exchange that for something smaller and more modern. This speaker is certainly modern. The sound is good but the mids and highs are a little muddy compared to my passive speakers. The bass is good for the size of this unit but nothing insane. I would recommend this for use in a bedroom on display as a piece of art because again it is modern in design and quite beautiful in its simplicity. Just not the speaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not have your phone connected to Bluetooth if trying to sync with another speaker perfect otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best speakers for the price I don't think I've ever had a single speaker raddle my basement walls, and the multiple connection option for 2 of them actually works very well with the h/k onyx studio 3 and pairs with no problem I would never switch to another speaker brand for the life of me absolutely beautiful crisp sound with heavy hitting bass 100% buy if you want something to fill your house with music
customer_reviews.author: Tristin K.

customer_reviews.title: 130 watts of roaring power
customer_reviews.text: so I bought 2, plan was to hook them up with a duel transmitter, to power both speakers with once source, but one was loud enough for the open room of 1600sq ft. 2nd speak was not needed for the space. used it in the back room on a different source. This is a loud speaker when turned to max on speaker. and then volume from the preamp or phone just needed to be bumpped up for your proper listen levels. Played classical musical in the hall and it sounded fine on the low end stings, and the high sounded good for the horns.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is really awesome. The lights are not really that much of an addition to it 's coolness but pretty. Sounds is really good. I bought one after I heard a friend on mine's. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: DISSATISFIED USED SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a brand new speaker and disappointed to see the box was taped up multiple times. When I took the speaker out, it was filthy and covered in dust with multiple scratches. The sound seems like it’s not crisp and speaker is partially blown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I used this speaker for a week, and the Bluetooth can’t be connected. And it powers off immediately I turn it on! Do not buy it. It seems that there are many similar issues
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker. Useless app and resources.
customer_reviews.text: Its harman kardon somi was expecting amazing things. But the bass effect on this speaker is really something else. It always captures guest attention for its sound more then its design. Terrible resources and some pretty cheap corner cutting software wise. They have an app but its completely useless if you have the BT model or the wifi model. Apple users have no resources available. But the speaker is excellent. I have the BT model and the range on the BT is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool, Good Sounding, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hardcore audiophile so I can't tell you how great it sounds, but it looks great and connects easily. We kept the box so we can take it places without worrying too much about it breaking into a million pieces. Bottom line is that I like it and would recommend it to anyone else that had about $160 to spend on a decent quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Scratched & Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received and the speaker was without a doubt damaged and returned by another buyer and then shipped to me. I returned and as always Amazon did an excellent job having HK ship another one. Second one arrived equally scratched and damaged. The sound is excellent and speakers lights very cool - I recommend the product but no clue why I received clearly scratched and damaged good twice. Even if I had purchased a refurbished speaker, the physical state of the speaker would have been unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: William Axl Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very good for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Took a moment to find the controls on the front...they kind of blend into the background. Easy set up, plugged in and it worked with no hassles. A teenager-type might think it's not loud enough but works fine for an old codger like me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in NH

customer_reviews.title: BASSSSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: This speaker BOOOOOOOMS if you want that soul snatching base here you go. I love this speaker, I went through JBL Boombox and Bose Soundtouch 30 searching for bass. LOOK NO FURTHER THIS IS IT. Only dislike lights don’t jam with music like I thought it would. It a great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Ladarious

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is not in sync with the sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, bluetooth connection is okay as well. One reason I bought it was for the light effects but I'm a bit disappointed that the lighting effect is not in sync with the audio coming out of the speaker. The lighting pattern seems to be random. Other than that, I am enjoying the sound and aesthetics of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: K. A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a new product
customer_reviews.text: Used product and didnt came with the ac adapter, no original box, and broken
customer_reviews.author: antonio  franceschi

customer_reviews.title: Sound beyond soul
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my music an the app i have on my phone plus the bass this thing gives off is unbelievable, my soul feels almost complete having this in my house,now all i need to do is viy another one to have crazy sound when i get ready. I love you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best speaker! Lets not argue
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best speaker! Lets not argue! Other then the fact its not wireless, this speaker is uncomfortable. The bass on it is what I live for. Ill be getting a few more to put in each room so im not having to move the one I have around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kheona Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and impeccably cool.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these speakers--they just look so cool when they light up and 'breathe' (the light isn't static, but ebbs and flows). The sound is great, as is the stable bluetooth connection. I actually use this as the sound system for my projector/theater room at my house, and again, the sound and bluetooth pairs with my smart projector really well.
customer_reviews.author: I.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I swapped out a Sonos 2 because I couldn't keep it connected. Sonos sounded amazing ... but the connection was an issue with our wifi. I was nervous I would lose the sound quality and the low-end tones. I'll tell you the nerves are gone and I'm thrilled with the purchase. I'm no audiofile but am picky ... it sounds great! Gets loud! Bass kicks! Set up took :60 including opening the box. Great purchase. As for the lighting feature... I don't use it at night so have no idea and could care less if it lights up. Looks great on the shelf too in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It does an amazing job at producing sound. The bass hits really good, and it is super loud for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound and a cool modern design. This speaker packs a punch when it comes to high quality sound. Set up is a no brained takes nothing to be set up and using even for the tech challenged plug it in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Jnor

customer_reviews.title: Very high sound quality and gets loud.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was a gift for my wife, and they didn't disappoint. They produce a very high quality sound that gets louder than you need. This is a good speaker, that was easy to connect to and use. It looks good and sounds great, the quality is apparent when you get it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Langham

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker can get really loud and I love to use at home for when I have people over or am working out at home. I have gotten noise complaints which I think is a good sign for a speaker especially when the volume is not even at its max. PLus it looks like a jellyfish and adds some decoration to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Saskya

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Having owned several HK products, I love this HK studio 2 the most. I have a 20x30 room and it feels the area with more than enough sound. It’s crisp and clear and the bass is on point. The size is compact enough. The higher the volume, the more you hear the sub at its max, but only if you stand right next to it. Can’t ask for a better Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has awesome sound, great bass response and crystal clear mid and high range. We have it in our garage/man-cave and it fills the entire space without struggling like many of the more portable wireless speakers. Bluetooth connectivity is almost effortless. Great value and really great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW, I love the look and the sounds by far my best bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.author: Attie

customer_reviews.title: Sounds are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my wife and she just loves it. The sounds are just so smooth. Is a little pricey but if you want quality, it’s gonna cost you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for an amazing price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this thing!! Having a roommate on an opposite schedule has made it hard to really use it to its full abilities very often but when I have I am in heaven! I do wish there were a way to connect it to a non-Bluetooth tv though so I don’t have to buy a second sound system for that too. It is bulky so you will need a designated spot for it
customer_reviews.author: reanne

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Great sound quality and base sounds great. It has a great modern look, puts out a lot of sound and doesn't take up much space. Very happy with this purchase and this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Charles

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth Harman Kardon Aura is the best sounding speaker I have. The sound is so crisp and clear and the bass is very solid. I would highly recommend this awesome speaker. My mother bought one after hearing mine. It also has a nice light show while listening.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Saurs

customer_reviews.title: indeed a very nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: we have it in our bedroom, and it is very handy when you want to create a special sound universe in your bedroom, or put workout music for your morning exercise!
customer_reviews.author: onotole

customer_reviews.title: Simply Love IT
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. This is definitely a want not a need type purchase. There are other less expensive blue tooth speakers but I LOVE this.
customer_reviews.author: tls78754

customer_reviews.title: Great HK unit
customer_reviews.text: I first heard this HK unit at a Christmas party. I could not believe the incredible sound from such a small unit. When the opportunity presented itself, I bought one for myself. My wife and have absolutely loved it. We dance around our house listening to this unit. I will probably buy a second one and pair it together.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No better bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great sound...really love it. I wish it came with a remote control but it lights up a big space with sound. I have 5 bluetooth devices, this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Devonia D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: A Gift For My Nephew
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Nephew as a Birthday gift and it was a big hit. Everybody at the gathering commented on how the design was very unique and beautiful, that was before they even heard it. My Nephew finally got to try it out after his party when everybody finally unpaired their own phones and went home. My Nephew mentioned to me the other day that he is really enjoying it. The sound is stellar.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyG

customer_reviews.title: More durable than even the manufacturer knows!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker after seeing one a guy had at work. It was being used in a very dusty area with paint overspray, buffing compound, and very harsh solvents coming in contact with it on a daily basis with only a cotton rag taped to the top covering the opening. He's used it every day for almost a year now in that environment and his still functions and sounds as good as mine at home. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Great look and sound
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sounds good. Great design. I get lots of compliments on the looks and sound. You can also have the lights twitch with the beat of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Qbcoach15

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker! My son-in-law has wanted this for a couple of years, so he was very excited to get it for Christmas. It sounds wonderful and they can hear it all over the house, on the front porch and on the back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B Racca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. It has amazing sound. Now, if they only made one that could charge or had batteries so it was more portable
customer_reviews.author: RanchyGirl

customer_reviews.title: The best loud bass and sound to take everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Really gives surrounding sound in a small sleek twch design!!! Similar to Bose or next best to me
customer_reviews.author: Keeshat

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how good it sounds for the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: julio pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Black
customer_reviews.text: The Harman Kardon Aura Studio 2 Bluetooth is awesome!! It is the TRUTH got to love it. Will be ordering another sometime this week. Honestly I don’t see anything wrong with Aura Studio 2 Bluetooth. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Myesha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker and sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loves it. He plays music from his phone all the time. Plays music beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: One of the best speakers we've owned so far. The sounds is loud and crisp, no distortion when the volumne is up.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Look good but weak bass, no bass control, app sucks
customer_reviews.text: Look good but weak bass, no bass control, app sucks. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Do it it’s the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best bang for your buck. I own two. They are amazing. Buyer beware on 100 power you will get a noise complaint. All of my neighbors have subsequently purchased one as well.
customer_reviews.author: connor furlough

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SPEAKER HAS THE GREATEST SOUND IT IS A BIT BULKY SO NOT SO GREAT FOR TRAVEL FOR HOME OR BASEMENT ENTERTAINMENT THIS IS GREAT! I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Merl W.

customer_reviews.title: Sacrificed on the quality of the sound for the looks
customer_reviews.text: The looks are cool but the sound quality is less than Sonos. I bought both to compare and Sonos was way better.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, looks good, perfect low sound. Pairing is kind difficult to use. It looks like you should press both Bluetooth button for more then 5 seconds. Then turn on your phone's Bluetooth after two speakers connecting with each other. If seller provide more detail about pairing two speakers, I can considering give 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: lich

customer_reviews.title: The bomb
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable....wow..even my hair style client's that heard it has bought them too.
customer_reviews.author: dana berndt

customer_reviews.title: Rattling sound
customer_reviews.text: When it reaches half volume, whenever bass plays it rattles and is an AWEFUL sound, other than that, it’s response frequencies are outstanding, even reaching lows better than my 12” JBL car sub, very impressive, just don’t plan on turning it up past half
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of speaker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about this speaker. The sound is great. I own 3 Harmon Kardon speakers, Harmon Kardon Aura, Aura 2, Onyx. I have 2 at home and 1 at work.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only bought one thinking for that price the sound quality would be great with just one. Read reviews later and most positive reviews for good sound quality, people had at least two
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Howard

customer_reviews.title: ... received my Harman Kardon Bluetooth Speaker today and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Harman Kardon Bluetooth Speaker today and I LOVE IT!! The packaging was great and the sound quality of this speaker is very nice. The volume and clarity are also awesome. My dad listened to it and shortly after had me go online to order him one. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Iman Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and easy to use. The cord is a great length to allow the speaker to be placed on a higher table and still reach the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: vv

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Had the first one and bought my husband the 2nd version. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Prettybaby

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. The sound is clear and it blows all other speakers I have had out of the water. The blue tooth capability is so convenient. I took it to work since we don’t have intercom music, and my employees are able to hear it throughout the office. I even bought a separate one for my house. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: pattie arismendez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has a beautiful "round" sound and it's great looking- much nicer than how it looks in the picture. Volume capacity is high without distortion. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mitzu

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several speakers before, JBL (Pulse3), Bose and this by far is my best one to date. This is a conversation piece. the unique aethetics of the speaker is what pushed me to make the purchase. I love the 360 surround effect and it fills the living room. I would highly recommend purchasing this, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: OMG the BASS in this speaker!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 😍♥️♥️♥️😍 this speaker. The bass in it is like no other. It's exactly what I've been searching for. Pros: the bass, volume, price Cons: no remote
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Sent

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn't even power up.
customer_reviews.text: Have not ever been able to use this item and was a total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for the price is near unbeatable, it lacks in features compared to some other Bluetooth speakers, but it looks so unique and functions flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: DerpyDoda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on 220v!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine on 110, doesn't work on higher voltage. Otherwise it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: TRenn

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon Speaker....
customer_reviews.text: Speaker has rich deep sound, not a loud speaker but decent for most of my listening. The light effects make the speaker look really cool when in darker room.
customer_reviews.author: Hastings MI

customer_reviews.title: Awsome modern aura speaker 5/5
customer_reviews.text: My dad is a soundaphile and well this looked cool and new so I bought it for his beat, needless to say, great bass, great (loud) clear sound ,and lights up to:0
customer_reviews.author: DOPEST

customer_reviews.title: One of the best wireless speakers I used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wireless speakers I used. Clear sound, good bass and treble, Harman Kardon lives to its reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Condeiu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It came with a scratch on it, it wasn't a big deal but when u spend that kind of money u want perfection. The sound is the everything! Very crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound system
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great!!! Looks amazing!!! Easy Bluetooth connection (without security), too bad it not wireless, but still, you get a great product for what you pay. If you don't actually need the wifi/airplay/spotify features the Aura version (not Aura Studio 2 like this item) comes with, then go ahead buty this one.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: More tweeter please
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is just ok.. It needs alittle more of a tweeter. The bass is perfect though. As far as the connection is easily connectable to Bluetooth or to usb. I think I’d rather buy a jbl speakers
customer_reviews.author: jiovani Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the sound of this speaker. It was easy to connect to dispite reviews that it was difficult to connect with. If there is a connection problem it is your phone not the speaker. Thanks Cliff
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Tucker

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing sound will highly recommend to anyone who has great taste in music sound and quality👍
customer_reviews.author: monica anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker the Sound is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was bought for a relative and she absolutely loves it. She blast it all over the house and just loves it. She has hinted that she wants another one to not disturb the whole house when she wants music in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice for home use but not advised for out door or as portable divide
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound , relaxing shape and lighting I like it
customer_reviews.author: Hamada

customer_reviews.title: This item is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this speaker, I have had it very loud in the shop and it doesn't mind at all. Great delivery on time, package in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysinhoth20

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now !
customer_reviews.text: Totally Worth It! Its Small! & it sounds so amazing! Definately recommend it! The lights look amazing! The bass is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: julia sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy one more in a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is the best subwoofer speaker I have. I Compared with a JBC and others. Also I do have the onyx studio 2 and the onyx studio 3.. this one has more bass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this item.
customer_reviews.text: I do love the design even the sound!! perfect for room deco.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Ho Kang

customer_reviews.title: got this Bluetooth speaker love it the base and the highs in the music ...
customer_reviews.text: Aww man! got this Bluetooth speaker love it the base and the highs in the music comes out nice thinking about purchasing another for another part of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Fountain

customer_reviews.title: No remote doesn’t make sense
customer_reviews.text: This looks cool, sounds great, is portable. I have no idea why there’s no remote for it. That fact is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Turbitt

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker I have ever heard...can be heard down the street...the base sounds amazing
customer_reviews.author: JORDAN

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbelievable sound is amazing.You will love it. And it's beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Liu

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker i ever bought it's just fantastic and so ...
customer_reviews.text: The best speaker i ever bought it's just fantastic and so good the sound quality the bass and everything else
customer_reviews.author: waleed khan

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself.... A week later my wife found my newfound acoustic friend. Now we have 2. Looking to get 4. They connect /stereo. Amazing sound....love it....we both do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: KA but clearly not NEW
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but wasn’t packaged well. I thought it would be brand new, it clearly isn’t. The glass was dirty and not packed as if by Harmon Kardon. I paid full price and it should’ve been brand new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER IS SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I purchaased this for my nephew he looks everything about this product 5 STARS THANKS TO AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: DONNA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Music you can feel
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has such great sound. Beautiful rich sound and bass that you can feel.
customer_reviews.author: MovingVan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday. He is a speaker fanatic!! He LOVED IT! Add me go get it from out porch at 7am and blasted music! Idk if that says much haha. Worth it! I wasn’t too happy that tax was 16 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Zhenya

customer_reviews.title: Keep hands clean,
customer_reviews.text: YES, ALL THE CONTOLS SHOULD BE LIT UP ,ONLY 2 B/T AND ON,OFF BUTTONS. REST CANT FIND IN THE DARK. SHIPPING TO NEW ZEALAND, VERY CONFUSING. TRACKING ?
customer_reviews.author: Karl Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great servixe
customer_reviews.text: Very great product and very pleased with the packaging. The item came without any issues. Will buy from this company again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if i didnt have to keep it plugged in all the time. Other than that sounds great ! Everyone looks confused when it starts playing music
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: Sound of this speaker is amazing. We hooked it up to our projector outside to watch movies. Feels just like you are in the theater.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: I’ve needed a speaker upgrade for years in my home gym. This thing is a monster. Crystal clear audio and superb low end without mud.
customer_reviews.author: Eric endzel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power cord
customer_reviews.text: The speaker cord is not the one for the US. However Amazon gave me credit to buy another cord
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: I love it I think it's loud enough to play my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it I think it's loud enough to play my Guitar too when practicing a song I am learning and I love playing loud .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best speaker ever. Just make sure not to get anything in the dome because it doesn’t come apart with out breaking
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and good price. The only problem is the visibility of the control buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Sorin Alexandru Gheorghiu

customer_reviews.title: This speaker will change your life
customer_reviews.text: This speaker packs a punch. A good friend of mine had one and I fell in love so I bought one for my apartment, and the sound quality is simply amazing! It is extremely rich and well rounded with the sub built in. It is well worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

product_meta.title: Harman Kardon Aura Studio 2 Bluetooth Speaker System
product_meta.description: AMBIENT LIGHTING: Sound looks beautiful thanks to an ambient white light glow from the center turbine and an animated center ring of LEDs. EXTRAORDINARY SOUND EXPERIENCE: Harman Kardon's proprietary stereo-widening DSP technology delivers premium, fully optimized audio. ICONIC DESIGN: The evolved SoundSticks design adds a level of prestige to any interior while also integrating seamlessly with your Mac, iPhone, and other smart devices. Featuring iconic design, ambient lighting and ease of use, the Aura Studio 2 delivers the impeccable, high quality Bluetooth audio streaming you've come to expect from a Harman Kardon product. Equipped with an animated ambient white light that glows up from the center turbine and a sleek, tinted dome, your music has never looked better.
